mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date from board order by reg_date desc, bno desc;
select bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date from board where bno=#{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from board where bno=#{bno} and writer=#{writer}
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, up_date=now() where bno=#{bno} and writer=#{writer}
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date FROM board ORDER BY reg_date DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
